column1: Rural hospitals are the backbone of communities across #OK03. Especially during COVID-19 Congress must not allow these critical facilities to close.  I'll always fight for rural hospitals & for affordable high-quality healthcare for my fellow Oklahomans! https://t.co/erGbx8nCKi

ICYMI: The August #jobsreport shows that the economic comeback is underway and going strong. 🇺🇸   1.37 MILLION jobs were added in August and the unemployment rate fell to 8.4%.  Together we will defeat COVID-19 and rebuild the world's greatest economy! https://t.co/1pJC03ul8K

Earlier this week @realDonaldTrump signed an Executive Order strengthening America's medical supply chain.  Especially during COVID-19 Congress must promote pro-growth proposals that will strengthen our manufacturing base & create more jobs here at home. https://t.co/LgJqbcTcgI

Oklahomans have been hard at work- and these figures confirm Oklahoma is helping lead the way in economic recovery from COVID-19.   We still have a ways to go in defeating this virus but we must work to responsibly and safely get Oklahomans back to work! https://t.co/HnGQEwcdso

ICYMI: The Trump Administration is putting America First and is working hard to expedite a coronavirus vaccine to keep us safe! Thank you @realDonaldTrump for making the vaccine and treatments available as quickly and as safely as possible. https://t.co/EGY6yGisIy

THANK YOU to all of Oklahoma's nurses doctors hospital staff and volunteers who are fighting #COVID19 on the frontlines.  Since Congress passed the CARES Act Oklahoma's hospitals and rural health clinics have received over $500 million in aid. https://t.co/LPl7rP5JMf
